sub_concepts.name: Cosmic Microwave Background Radiation
sub_concepts.definition: Faint radiation left over from the Big Bang, expanding across the universe

sub_concepts.name: Inflation Theory
sub_concepts.definition: The theory explaining the rapid expansion of the universe in the early stages after the Big Bang

sub_concepts.name: Singularity
sub_concepts.definition: A point in space-time where gravitational forces cause matter to be compressed to infinite density

sub_concepts.name: Dark Matter
sub_concepts.definition: Hypothesized matter that does not emit light or energy but interacts with gravity to influence the cosmos
